description.narrative: The objective is to improve the quality of service provided to the urban transpo rt users in the area of influence of the new Line 4 stations and facilitate the integration between metro and bus at those stations.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A1. | Description :The São Paulo State Secretariat for Metropolitan Transport mustmaintain throughout the Project a PCU responsible for the overall coordination of the Project and to implement the studies. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A2 | Description :SP Metro must maintain throughout the duration of the Project a ProjectManagement Unit in charge of managing its respective components and tracking physical and Financial progress. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B1 | Description :The Borrower, through STMSP, shall enter into an agreement (SubsidiaryAgreement) with SP Metro, under terms and conditions approved by the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B1 | Description :Ensure enforcement of indicators in a timely manner. | Frequency:Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B1, | Description :Maintain Financial Management system. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B2 | Description :Send to the Bank interim unaudited financial reports for the projectcovering the pertinent quarter. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B3 | Description :Borrower shall cause SP Metro to have its financial statements auditedin accordance with the provisions of Section 5.09(b) of the General conditions. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Accessibility objective: Total annual passenger boardings in new stations (both directions, in millions)
cumulative % of completion of Vila Sônia Station
Cumulative % of completion of Vila Sônia Tunnel
cumulative % of completion of Vila Sônia yard
cumulative % of completion of existing stations (finalization)
Integration objective: Percentage of 5 new stations integrated with bus lines
Quality of service objective: Travel time plus average waiting time between pairs of stations (in minutes, at peak hour)
